snippet.title: Mirror's Edge Announcement Teaser Trailer - Official E3 2013
snippet.description:
Official announcement teaser for the new Mirror's Edge game for Playstation 4, Xbox One and PC. Play through the origin story of Faith and explore the city with an unprecedented level of freedom of action and movement. Learn more at www.mirrorsedge.com 

Mirror's Edge marks the return of the critically acclaimed first-person action adventure game from DICE. Powered by the Frostbite engine, Mirror's Edge allows gamers to immerse themselves in a magnificent dystopian world and discover its darkest secrets. Experience the origin story of Faith and delve deeper into the inner workings of the city and the world around it.

Mirror's Edge is in early stages of development in the DICE studio in Stockholm, Sweden. Subscribe to this channel and be the first to know when the team is ready to show more!

Stay up to date on Mirror's Edge with the official social channels:

http://www.Twitter.com/MirrorsEdge 
http://www.Facebook.com/MirrorsEdge
